description: Try our easy to follow Smokey Lamb Cutlets with Fresh Mint Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Father's Day,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smokey Lamb Cutlets with Fresh Mint Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine thyme, paprika, garlic, lemon juice and oil in a bowl and stir until well combined.
Place cutlets in a shallow container, add marinade and rub into the meat. Set aside for 30 minutes to allow for the flavours to penetrate.
Meanwhile, chop or process the mint, parsley, capers and anchovies. Combine in a bowl with chilli flakes. Stir in extra olive oil and season with salt. Set aside.
Preheat barbecue hotplate to medium-high. Cook cutlets, turning once, until done to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover with foil and rest for 3-4 minutes before serving. Serve with mint sauce.
